full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Furniture Procurement Opportunity

**Reference:** WS3348539464-Doc3744780682

**Title:** Furniture Procurement Opportunity

**Amendment:** 1

**Publication Date:** November 10, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2022, at 2:00 PM (AST)

**Solicitation Number:** WS3348539464

## Tender Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the purchase and delivery of furniture products to the National Capital Region (NCR). The estimated delivery period is between June 16, 2023.

## UNSPSC and Description

The following UNSPSC codes and descriptions are applicable to this procurement opportunity:

* Office furniture (56101700)
* Credenzas (56101701)
* Filing cabinets or accessories (56101702)
* Conferencing tables (56101706)
* Benches (56112109)

## Trade Agreements

The procurement may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Tender Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

All bids must be submitted electronically through the SAP Ariba platform. The Government of Canada's Vendor Registration process must be completed before accessing the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Point of Contact

For any questions or concerns, please contact Alexandre Mallette at alexandre.mallette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Notice URL

The full RFP and attachments can be accessed through the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14604141?extsite=MTQ2MDQxNDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

### End of Tender Announcement

This tender announcement was generated on November 17, 2022, and is subject to amendments as necessary. The PSPC is responsible for this procurement opportunity. For more information, please contact the PSPC.
